title: LAG SPIKES
body: I have been playing league of legends since around the middle of 2010. Nvr have I had the problem of it telling me that I have 0 ping during a game & it making be unable to move or cast any ability or do anything @ all. I was hoping that this would be an a quickly addressed situation but it apparently is not since it has been happening since the recent patch release & not just to me. Is there something going to be done bout this? what's the game plan? cuz i'm rly not appreciatin losin my games b/c the servers r goin on the fritz? Thx 4 ur time.

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by 0 ping?  Are you seeing an input delay, or is the game completely frozen?  Anymore details like what you're seeing and when or error messages can help!
